name: Telescoping Ladder 16 FT A Frame Aluminum Extension Ladder, Lightweight RV Ladder with Stabilizer Bar, Multi-Purpose Collapsible Ladder for Home or Outdoor Work, Heavy Duty 330lbs Max Capacity
short_description: 【Telescoping ladder】16 steps, step distance is 11.8 inch, extension height: 16 FT, storage size: 39 × 26 × 6 inch, easy to store, convenient to put in luggage or car or sofa crevice.
【Lightweight and Portable】Extension ladder is big when extended but small when folded. Easy to carry and move, great for RV, SUV and any type of vehicle.

【Stabilizer Bar】Multi-purpose A-frame ladder adjustable from 2.8 FT to 16 FT, Stabilizer Bar has been added to improve ladder stability and reduce sway. Telescoping ladder can be used as an 8 FT + 8 FT A-frame ladder or a 16 FT straight ladder for roof and attic stairs.
【Aluminum Alloy】Made of high quality aluminum alloy with an oxidized finish to extend the life of the ladder. Maximum weight capacity: 330 lbs. product weight: 39 lbs.
【Multi-purpose Ladder】RV ladder with sturdy hinge-lock mechanism can be used as an A-frame ladder, straight extension ladder, stair tread ladder, and scaffolding support.
product_description: ▻ Telescoping Ladder 16 FT Aluminum A-Frame Ladder with Stabilizer Bar, Extension Ladder for Outdoor Working, 2-in-1 Multi-Purpose A Type Multi-Purpose Folding Ladder, Collapsible Ladders for Household Use ▻ All-in-One Versatile Ladder: ① A-frame ladder 8 FT + 8 FT ② Straight extension ladder 16 FT ③ Stairway step ladder ④ As stand support of scaffold ▻ Features: 1. name: LITE 28-foot Fiberglass Extension Ladder, 300-Pound Load Capacity, Type IA, LP-3021-28
short_description: NON-CONDUCTIVE: Crafted with fiberglass for non-conductive safety assurance, this extension ladder combines strength and durability.
MAXLOCK RUNG LOCK: Engineered with your safety in mind, custom engineered specifically for our extension ladders from a patented, advanced molecular polymer.
QUICKLATCH SYSTEM: Seamlessly offers a straightforward and intuitive solution for our extension ladders, securing both the fly and base sections during extension.
SAFE AND STABLE: Steel Swivel Safety Shoe with metal shield specifically designed for extension ladders, ensures stability and safety even on uneven surfaces.
STURDY AND STRONG: With its 300-Pound capacity, elegant design and smooth finish, you won’t find a more durable, reliable 24-foot Extension Ladder.
product_description: This LITE 28 feet fiberglass extension ladder has a 375 lbs. load capacity, rated ANSI IAA Type. This extension ladder is great for working on electrical, utility, light construction and residential jobs. It features D shaped rungs that are fully serrated for a slip resistant surface. Includes two extra heavy-duty slide guides to prevent over extending the extension ladder. Equipped with the MAXLOCK rung lock, engineered to be the strongest, toughest, lightest rung lock ever made for extension ladders. This extension ladder also includes the patented QuickLatch system that provides a simple, intuitive method of securing the ladder when extended. Features wivel safety shoes with overmolded polymer tread that be used with the tread down or in spike position.

name: Extension Ladder, 20.3FT RIKADE Aluminum Telescoping Ladder with Non-Slip Feet, Portable Telescopic Ladder for Household and Outdoor 330lb Capacity
short_description: ✔【Premium Aluminum Alloy】--RIKADE telescopic ladder using 6063 high strength and high hardness aluminum alloy tube, better quality and safer. Package 19.88”×3.74”×42.32”.The net weight of the aluminum ladder is34.2lbs.
✔【Great Stability】--Fully safe load bearing 330 pounds, suitable for most people, independent button adjustment of each section can effectively prevent pinching hands when contracted.

✔【Independent Locking Mechanism】--For safety, we purposely designed each section with independent locking mechanism to fix and adjust the extension ladder, effectively preventing accidental contraction and more personalized needs to adjust the height of telescoping ladder.

✔【Multi-scene Use】--This extendable ladder is not only suitable for daily household cleaning, organizing the use of high objects, can also be used for workers in the project, when let is also suitable for outdoor camping car roof tent and other uses.

✔【Portable and Compact】--The lighter weight telescoping ladder and the handrail designed at the bottom make the ladder easy to carry to common scenarios, while the extension ladder can be easily stored under beds, in corners, in storage cabinets and in cars.

name: 330lb 12.5ft Multi Purpose Aluminum Extension 7 in 1 Folding Step Ladder Foldable Lightweight Scaffold Ladder
short_description: Safe and Reliable - Heavy-duty aircraft-grade aluminium construction; square rungs and supporting tubes, make this folding ladder stable and durable; meets EN131 standard; maximum load capacity is 330 lbs.

Anti-slip Design - Adopting the design of zigzag anti-slip foot straps, which can prevent ladder from sliding during use to a certain extent; with the undulating ridges of the square rungs, it can avoid soles slipping during use as much as possible

Large Joints and Security Locks - Adopting large joints, whose load capacity and durability are three times higher than with smaller joints; connected by six security locks, which can be opened and locked for changing the shape of ladder easily while guaranteeing the security

Great Step Stool - Great for attic, library, above ground pool, bunk bed, apartment fire ladder escape, trampoline. Use it to access your roof or balcony, clean your windows, get interior and exterior painting and decorating done.

Multi-function - This aluminium ladder can be used as scaffold, leaning ladder, stepladder and also can be changed into many different shapes to meet different height requirements and working needs. Can be used 9 different ways, use as a temporary bridge or at construction. It can be used as single ladder, double sided ladder, trestle, work platform, stair ladder, telescoping ladder, twin stepladder, stairway stepladder, or as two scaffold bases etc.

name: BOWEITI 26.2FT Telescoping Ladder, Aluminum Collapsible Ladder w/Non-Slip Feet, Lightweight RV Compact Ladders, Telescopic Ladders for RV, Household, Outdoor, 330lbs Capacity Extension Ladder (26.2FT)

name: Telescoping Ladder, 20.3FT Aluminum Extension Ladder with 2 Replacement of Non-Slip Rubber Cover, Telescopic Ladder Portable Collapsible RV Ladder for Indoor Outdoor Work, 330 lb. Weight Capacity
short_description: Telescoping Ladder Material: The 20.3 ft extension ladder is made of high quality aluminum alloy. Plastic parts are reinforced with nylon fiber to improve bearing capacity, stability, aging resistance and prolong service life. Our telescoping ladder has a load of 330 LBS /150 kg.

Locking Mechanism: The independent locking mechanism allows the aluminum 20.3FT telescoping ladder to be locked at every step. Using the inward sliding latch, you can gradually adjust the stepping in units of one foot to easily reach and retract any desired height. (Pls take care your fingers when retract the ladder. Don't put your thumb between the ladder.)

Safe and Reliable: Every pedal of telescopic ladder 20.3ft is striated for increased friction;stable locking secure pedals, avoiding bumping and falling off, high quality anti-slip rubber feet, easy to secure the telescoping ladder to wall and floor.

Portable Easy Storage: The retractable folding ladder is light and easy to carry. This telescoping ladder is convenient and saves storage space. Our extension ladder can be placed under the bed, behind cabinets, behind doors, etc.

Extension Ladder Application: Maximum height of 20.3ft telescopic ladder, can be used for daily household or hobbies, such as changing light bulbs, painting walls, cleaning windows, climbing trees, attic ladders, etc. Our extension ladder also meets safety standards for your peace of mind. I believe this little extension ladder can bring great convenience to your life.

Please Notice: Do not push the button at the same time when pulling the extension ladder. The correct method is to push one side first, hold the top of the collapsible ladder with the other hand, and then press the other button to bring the ladder down. Please pay attention to the safety of use.

name: Soctone Ladder, A Frame 4 Step Extension Ladder, 14.5 Ft with Multi Position & Removable Tool Tray with Stabilizer Bar, 330 lbs Weight Rating Telescoping La dder for Household or Outdoor Work
short_description: Reduced Wobble: After repeated tests, we added two new Stabilizer Bar, which can have a wider contact area with the ground and effectively improve the stability by 36% compared with the same product.
Removable Tool Tray: We come with a convenient removable tool tray, you can put screwdrivers, paint buckets and other tools on it when using our ladder to improve your work efficiency.

Safety of Use: The high quality construction of the Muti-Position ladder ensures that each part retracts safely. Safety Protection Hinge Lock and Solid J Lock hold the parts in place and prevent sliding, and the ladder will retract smoothly and slowly.

Quality Material: The sturdy frame of the telescopic ladder is made of high-quality aluminum alloy, which is resistant to wear and corrosion, rust, high and low temperatures and aging, and can withstand up to 330 pounds of weight.

Multi-Scene Application: Changing light bulbs and going up to the attic indoors, or repairing roofs or climbing into RVs outdoors, our aluminum retractable ladders can be used in any scenario where you need a ladder.
